[00:00.00]Three Little Birds - Maroon 5 (魔力红)
[00:03.34]Lyrics by：Bob Marley
[00:06.68]Composed by：Bob Marley
[00:10.02]Produced by：Adam Levine/Noah Passovoy
[00:13.37]Don't worry about a thing
[00:19.54]Cause every little thing is gonna be alright
[00:25.60]But don't worry about a thing hey
[00:32.06]Cause every little thing is gonna be alright oh
[00:37.71]Rise up this morning smiled with the rising sun
[00:43.34]Three little birds by my doorstep
[00:49.75]Singing sweet songs of melodies pure and sure
[00:56.28]Saying this is my message to you
[01:02.23]Singing don't worry about a thing oh oh
[01:08.72]Cause every little thing is gonna be alright yeah yeah
[01:14.88]But don't worry about a thing
[01:21.16]Cause every little thing is gonna be alright yeah

[01:38.93]Singing sweet songs of melodies pure and sure

[01:51.39]Singing don't worry about a thing oh

[02:10.26]Cause every little thing is gonna be alright yeah
[02:16.15]Baby don't worry about a thing

[02:28.66]Don't worry about a thing
[02:34.93]Cause every little thing is gonna be alright yeah
[02:41.10]Don't worry about a thing
[02:47.58]Cause every little thing is gonna be alright

[02:59.91]Cause every little thing is gonna be alright yeah

[00:13.37]什么都不用担心
[00:19.54]因为任何事都会好起来的
[00:25.60]什么都不用担心
[00:32.06]因为任何事都会好起来的

[00:49.75]唱着甜美纯粹的旋律
[00:56.28]她们说 这是传递给你的信息
